events.name: Photoshop Must-Knows, Illustrator for Work and InDesign for iBook
events.description: ======================== Registration Details (at Xerox Building) ========================= Registration starts from 5.45pm, please proceed immediately to level 4 , Fuji Xerox Tower at Anson Road (Tanjong Pagar). This session will start at 6.00pm. ========================= Meeting Topics ========================= Session 1 Adobe Photoshop CC with Shirley Tan 5 Must-knows for a Photoshop User This session is a collection of cool little features, some hidden keystrokes combinations and some techniques that you may not hear of. We will cover stuff like luminosity masks, perspective warp, on-image adjustment and more. Join me to discover these hidden gems and implement them in your next project. Session 2 Adobe Illustrator CC with Leon Lim What can you do with Adobe Illustrator? Adobe Illustrator is more than just a powerful vector software. In this session, Leon will demonstrate the various ways that I use Adobe Illustrator in my work. From print to websites to drawings floor plan layout. He will also also show features inside Adobe Illustrator that makes it such a powerful tool. Session 3 Adobe InDesign CC with Mark Plunkett Creating Fixed Layout ePub using InDesign CC 2014 The demand for digital versions of books and documents are increasing, in this session Mark will be demonstrating on how simple it is to be able to create your own ePub digital book for the iBook on iPad. ========================= Agenda ========================= 6.00pm - 6.30pm Session 1: Adobe Photoshop 6.30pm - 6.50pm Session 2: Adobe Illustrator 6.50pm - 7.00pm Short break & Refreshments 7.00pm - 7.20pm Session 3: Adobe InDesign ========================= Refreshments ========================= Hot beverages, water and snacks will be provided during the meeting with compliments from Fuji Xerox Singapore. ========================= Facebook ========================= http://www.facebook.com/groups/idugsg/ ========================= Twitter ========================= @InDesignSG ========================= Sponsors ========================= This meeting has been made possible with the generous support of Adobe, Fuji Xerox Singapore, ACE Training, Touch & Print and Dexel.
events.location: Fuji Xerox Singapore, 80 Anson Road, Fuji Xerox Towers, S(079907)
events.group_name: Singapore Graphic Design and Publishing Group

events.name: Thursday 16th July
events.description: Our goal is to make the Ruby on Rails community in Singapore more inclusive for women and other minorities - so if you know anyone that codes or that you think would enjoy learning to code, invite them along!

events.name: Introducing DevFest.Asia 2015
events.description: You're invited because you are an important part of our Singapore technology and design community and we need your help to create DevFest.Asia 2015 in November. Please come by and learn about our efforts and how you can help make it amazing and enjoy some drinks on us.
